title: 'Nok Premium Seat' is now available.
text:
Home » travel » 'Nok Premium Seat' is now available. AIR TRAVEL 'Nok Premium Seat' is now available. THE NATION August 6, 2015 6:40 pm 
Nok Air's Bombardier Dash 8 Q400 NextGen Nok Air offers new air travel experience with much comfortable seats. Nok Air, a low-cost airline in Thailand, has launched its latest new service "Nok Premium Seat" to make passengers feel more comfortable, private and special. Nok Premium Seat is the new service that will add more comfort to the flight, more convenience and more leg room. With Bt240 more expensive than the usual air ticket, Nok Premium Seat promises the passengers comfortable seats in front rows from Seat number 31 - 35 or 44 - 45. "At Nok Air, we always give priority to safety but one thing that we never stop to offer to all of our passengers is to improve on board services to make our passengers feel more comfortable. And now we have launched Nok Air's latest new service, Nok Premium Seat that can be easily reserved on Nok Air website with remaining of free seat selection service for regular seats" noted Patee Sarasin, CEO of Nok Air. The air traveller can reserve the service directly when booking the flight on www.nokair.com, www.nokfanclub.com, www.nokair.com/noksmilebooking, Airport Ticket Office and Call Center 1318 Visit www.nokair.com for more information. 52 Viewed
